description: S16 files can only be played in the digital voice recorder that created them. They can be transferred to a computer via a USB cable as a backup but they cannot be played in a program on a computer. However, S16 files can be converted to .WAV files using Sharp Data Conversion Tool for PA-VR Series (also known as PAVR), which is only available for Windows.
NOTE: The name of an S16 file typically includes the date it was created and a number indicating the order in which it was created.
